  • Method Details

    • getUserByUsername

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getUserByUsername(String username)
      Method to get a user by username from the database. If the user is found, the status code is 200. If the user is not found, the status code is 404. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to get.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the User object and status code.

    • createUser

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createUser(UserDTO userDTO)
      Method to create a user from a UserDTO object. Saves the user to the database if the username is not already taken. If the user is created successfully, the status code is 201. If the username is already taken, the status code is 409. If an error occurs, the status code is 500.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - The UserDTO object to create the user from.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message and status code.

    • getUserObjectByUsername

      public UserDAO getUserObjectByUsername(String username)

    • deleteUser

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(String username)
